name: Bleum
tagline: 140 IQ, CMMi Level 5, ISO 270001 top 1% Team
description:
Founded in 2001, Bleum has spent over 10 years delivering high-performance software development from Asia. China-based and internationally managed, Bleum prides itself on delivering highest-quality, mission-critical applications through offshore development centers that become an integral extension of our clients' IT organizations.
We provide a range of services including application development, support and maintenance, testing and legacy system modernization, and product development to clients in North America, Europe and Asia-Pacific. Our track record of industry-setting standards ensures that your most important software development needs are in capable hands.
Bleum was the first company in China to receive both ISO27001 and CMMi 5 certifications, and is still one of the few in the world to have CMMi5 certifications company-wide.
Bleum has been ranked on the International Association of Outsourcing Professional's list of the top 100 global outsourcing providers for the past 7 years.
Bleum pushes the boundaries of quality, having delivered 30% of all projects with zero defects and a 1% schedule variance over the past 2 years.
